name: FL10 - Remastered
description:
/ Prototype game developed to get our hands on GameMaker Studio 1. /

/ Very first project created within this team. /

-------------------
Remake of some of the Pong-like games offered on HongKong's 90's console FL-10.
Made to be played with controller.

-------------------

Developped by the Wolpertingames team:

  • Xavier Lejeune: Programming
  • Anthony Lejeune: Vis Dev
  • Archonium: Music & sounds
